title: Chargeback issue
body:
Hi,

My account got suspended for the chargeback issue, and I've made my payment today, but I forgot to convert the currency to EUR. What can I do about it?{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Hey there, I noticed that you've currently got a ticket open about this. The support rep currently handling your case is best equipped to look into your repayment and determine what needs to happen next so I'd wait for them to get back, which should be within the next 24 hours.

Hi,

It says on my acitivity that last update was 27 minutes ago, but no message was replied.{{item:3151}}
Ok, Thanks. Really want to play league{{champion:32}} .
